page.title: 02INDUSTRY POTTERY DEPOT
page.content: A growing industry in Gweek is the pot trade.The{Odyssey Trading Post. } The people who operate this post have been here three years and live in a caravan and boat.The terracotta pots come from Spain,Italy and North Wales. They arrive by sailing barge and forty foot container lorrys.Despite the size of the post it is only a distribution depot for England.The largest pot is twenty seven inches in diameter,twenty inches high and weighs thirty five point five kilogrammes and is worth fifty five pounds.They have their own barge which is called the Odyssey.She is one hundred and fifteen feet long and weighs two hundred and fifty tons.The engines are twin Mercedes of one hundred and thirty hp.She is made of ferrow concrete.The post employs 4people and is open 7 days a week all year round except Christmas Day.
